member.name: M:LayerCentral.Bonding.DetermineBondAction(LayerConnection.Dongle.IBondStatus,LayerConnection.Sylvac.BondMode)
member.summary: Determines a bond action to perform depending on the current bond status and a bond mode.
member.param: Current bond status of the couple central-peripheral (dongle-instrument)
Bond mode advertised by the peripheral (instrument) prior to being connected

member.name: M:LayerCentral.Bonding.DetermineBondActionWithCondition(LayerConnection.Dongle.IBondStatus,LayerConnection.Sylvac.BondMode,LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition)
member.summary: Determines a suitable "bond action" to perform, given a bond status, a bond mode, and a bond condition.
member.param: Bond status: paired, bonded, or none
Bond mode: bondable and bonded, bondable and not bonded, not bondable
Bond condition: on connection, on guess (using ), on insufficient error code, or never
member.returns: Bond action to take in order to satisfy the given arguments.

member.name: M:LayerCentral.Bonding.DetermineBondActionFromEvent(LayerConnection.Messaging.Event.ConnectionEvt,LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition)
member.summary: Determines a suitable "bond action" to perform, given a connection event and a bond condition.
member.param: Connection event containing a "bond status" and a "bond mode"
Bond condition: on connection, on guess (using ), on insufficient error code, or never
member.returns: Bond action to take in order to satisfy the given arguments.

member.name: P:LayerCentral.CentralLayerVia.ProcessUpperRequest
member.summary: Transmits a request to the upper layer.

member.name: M:LayerCentral.CentralLayerVia.PublishNewPeripheralStatus(LayerCentral.Peripheral.MountablePeripheral)
member.summary: Publishes statuses of a newly-added .
member.remarks: Status changes are then published by the event handlers registered in .

member.name: F:LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition.Never
member.summary: Never try to bond.

member.name: F:LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition.OnInsuf
member.summary: Try to bond if an insufficient encryption error is received when interacting with the GATT server.
member.remarks: Bluetooth 5 instruments return a error when bonding is required, whereas Bluetooth 4 instruments return a error.

member.name: F:LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition.OnConnect
member.summary: Try to bond as soon as the connection is established.

member.name: F:LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition.OnGuess
member.summary: Try to bond when the connection is established, if the advertising flags are 0x05.
member.remarks: Advertising flags value of 0x05 means with flags. It is interpreted as .

member.name: F:LayerCentral.Configuration.BondCondition.OnGuessOrInsuf
member.summary: Try to bond if advertising flags are 0x05, or if an insufficient encryption error is received when writing or reading ATT handles. Combination of and .

member.name: P:LayerCentral.Configuration.CentralLayerConfig.StaleBondPolicy
member.summary: Allows to automatically remove stale bonds on dongles.
member.remarks: A stale bond refers to a bond being present on a dongle but not on the instrument. It happens when a BT RESET is done on the instrument side only.

member.summary: Default configuration for mounting Bluetooth peripherals.
member.remarks: Mounting a Bluetooth device refers to connecting the device and performing operations that make it usable by upper layers.

member.name: P:LayerCentral.Configuration.IBleMountConfig.AllowSkipSubscribe
member.summary: Allow to skip subscribing to characteristics when a subscription is deemed existing.
member.remarks: A subscription is already existing when reconnecting a bonded device to which we were subscribed. Might also be the case if not bonded but with GATT caching enabled (to check).

member.name: T:LayerCentral.Peripheral.PairingStatus
member.summary: Bonding and pairing status.

list.item: Paired means that a connection is encrypted.
Bonded means that encryption keys are recorded on the Bluetooth central (dongle) to encrypt the current and the next connections.
